title: Help me with new pc
body:
Hi guys, i need help tu buy a laptop. i play lol and csgo, and  ill use it for university too so i ve seen many laptops and i really like the dell inspiron i7559 i hear very nice opinions about it but i dont know how it runs lol. anyone can help about how it works on lol (fps).
if you guys knows about other laptop for play lol and good settings pls tell me

replies.body:
While I can't tell you whether you should buy the Dell Inspiron or not, I can help by letting you know the [recommended hardware](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) we have for League of Legends.

We optimize League to run on as many computers as possible, so don't worry about getting a high end gaming machine to just run League.  Unless you want to see all of the pretty colors O.o
